feed.title: Marcus Cvjeticanin - x
feed.subtitle: Software Engineer specialized in backend systems. Java, Kotlin, JVM, CI/CD, Concurrency, Distributed Systems, Decentralized Systems.

entry.title: Best communities on 𝕏 for Software Engineers
entry.summary: 𝕏 is really working hard, especially with the communities. It’s great that the team on 𝕏 are listening to the people and responding to the feedback as fast as they do. Great work I must say, it differs a lot from other platforms.
